The Mayor mentioned that John caught 20 tons, while Kate, Jack, Emma, and Luke each caught 10 tons. The total caught was 60 tons. Initially, the lake had 100 tons, so after fishing, 40 tons remain. After reproduction, it doubles to 80 tons, which is below the carrying capacity of 100 tons. So, the next month, the lake starts with 80 tons.
